content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting the property. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 500 Euros. But I am negotiable. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. How much are you asking for the rental price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. Based on the size and location of the property, I was thinking of asking for a monthly rental price of 600 Euros. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider a lower price if it means we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you, Ryanah. I'm glad to hear that we have come to an agreement on the rental price. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the move-in process. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
